html:
12.17.23  9:16 pm   When you're working on something and halfway through you realize you aren't really happy with it or think maybe other people won't like it, do you ever scrap those entirely?

     no

      Or maybe try to rework some of it so youre happier with it?

     sure i might do that, but it's a slippery slope

      Or try to stick with the initial plan?

     that is often the most reliable solution

12.17.23  9:09 pm   we really should rename the black keys to JK and XYZ, it would be so nice. do you want to start a petition to make this change

      i tried to accomplish something similar, but it didn't last very long. XYZ was even more shortlived, because i immediately realized that the Z will tend to look too much like 2, and the X just looks too much like various other useful symbols. so i settled on JK,QRS which lasted for about 2 weeks until i became suddenly interested in communicating with other living humans

12.17.23  8:34 pm   Are you running for pope

      no

12.17.23  8:20 pm   What's your opinion of Calculus?

     it's good

     Who is cooler/more noteworthy calculus-wise: Newton or Leibniz?

      that's none of my business

12.17.23  7:03 pm   Mr Bill I made a fascinating discovery, it seems that my streets have always been dirty before the cleaning cars come and clean the streets. How about you? Were you able to remember?

      no, i'm usually so captivated by the street cleaning machine, it's hard to remember what it was like before

12.17.23  6:31 pm   what's the first part a song you write? chords, percussion, bass, or somethin' else? mix of all three?

      usually the beginning

12.17.23  6:26 pm   Have you ever personally experienced synchronicity or high strangeness?

      sure

12.17.23  5:50 pm   Opinion on doors

      too good to be true

12.17.23  3:49 pm   whats the most fun plant to be?

      palm

12.17.23  2:20 pm   can you imagine a hypercube?

      not really, but maybe i could with some practice

12.17.23  1:48 pm   what is consciousness

      it's you, or anyone else who's ever been someone

12.17.23  12:51 pm   Whats the meaning of meaning?

     itself

      And if theres a meaning for meaning, whats the meaning for meaning for meaning? Is it just a loop?

     it can go in any configuration. at various times, a simple loop may or may not be the most meaningful

12.17.23  12:28 pm   i just don't believe that there is an abstract syntaxis that every single language in the world shares, it's too good to be true
i just don't believe that people have grammatical constructions and their meanings stored in their minds like words in a dictionary, it's just too good to be true
i'm going to come up with a third way of approaching linguistics

      it might be a good idea to just learn some languages, by massive exposure to genuine spoken/written content over many years, and then once you feel comfortable in some different languages then you can take an honest look at them and get a first hand sense of how they compare to each other

12.17.23  12:13 pm   I have 20 full on songs without lyrics.

     that's usually not what 'full on' means to me, but that's ok

     I have no idea how to write lyrics. Do you have any advice on how to make good lyrics and how to learn?

     the first thing i can suggest is, don't wait until the song is 'done' before writing the lyrics. the best lyrics are usually written while the song is being written. it might even be good to stop calling it 'lyrics', or at least stop treating it like something other than the song

12.17.23  8:45 am   Thoughts on donuts

      improbable

12.17.23  6:41 am   how much water is there per glass?

      you'll have to measure the glass

12.17.23  3:51 am   what are you doing for christmas, bill? or if not chirstmas, whatever holiday you celebrate.

      any day is equally celebrable

12.17.23  12:22 am   Is time real?

     sure

     if so how?

     we can keep track of it, talk about it, and analyze it,

12.17.23  12:18 am   Do you think that anyone has truely original thoughts, thoughts that will never be thought by anyone at any time in the past or future?

      yes

12.16.23  10:53 pm   Do you think february needs more days?

     not necessarily

     If so how many days would you recommend we give it

     keep it simple, put all the days in february

12.16.23  10:32 pm   can you do this: (moves arms and body around randomly)

      no. it's very difficult for me, as a person, to do genuinely random things. my movements are always going to be motivated by my own particular stylistic feelings at any given moment

12.16.23  9:46 pm   What is your favourite type of juice?

      water

12.16.23  9:28 pm   What's the most normal thing you've ever done?

      i probably blocked it out of my memory

12.16.23  9:22 pm   I think I should die what should I do 

      something other than that, at least for now

12.16.23  9:10 pm   is the meaning contained in chords innately understood or learned from culture?

      some of both

12.16.23  9:07 pm   Why clothes

      for style

12.16.23  8:09 pm   Are flamingos the best birds?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.16.23  5:21 pm   whats the point of doing stuff if you just forget it all afterwards

      for the rhetoric then surely

12.16.23  4:51 pm   Is life meaningless, or do we create our meaning, or something?

      life has infinite meanings. but if that overwhelms you, you can find a unique and more finite set, ready for you

12.16.23  4:05 pm   How do you learn something and then understand it like muscle memory? 

      never heard of that -- muscle memory is when you no longer have to understand it, when it's just in your muscles, not your mind. but anyway, to get that you just do it a lot

12.16.23  1:48 pm   What's a color

      a flavor of light

12.16.23  12:14 pm   can you speak japanese?

      no

12.16.23  11:19 am   what exactly is a bucket?

     i'm not sure how to explain it, i just have an intuitive sense

     are we buckets?

     no

     what is the line between buckets and non-bucket things?

     somewhat blurred

     do the buckets even know?

     no

12.16.23  11:07 am   what is your favorite chord

      each one i've used in my song recordings, at that moment

12.16.23  10:57 am   what do you do when you feel miserable and unhappy with yourself? asking for myself.

      live to tell the tale

12.16.23  8:43 am   do you dance?

      if necessary

12.16.23  8:08 am   Why do they call it oven when you of in the cold food hot out eat the food?

      i hate to say it, but that's your fault

12.16.23  7:59 am   What are your opinions on Koalas?

      not as important as the opinion of someone who knows much more about Koalas, about Koalas

12.16.23  6:31 am   I find that when I try to write something especially meaningful, it tends to become more esoteric. Do you notice this with your work?

     no it's the opposite

     And do you ever think about it while writing lyrics?

     i have to use music and words together. if i want it to be especially meaningful, then i especially have to do that

12.16.23  5:02 am   weirdest food yoive eaten

      white castle

12.16.23  4:18 am   Do you think about thinking?

      not nearly as much as i think about feelings, or feel about thinking

12.16.23  3:45 am   whats your favorite piece of media?

      the identity matrix

12.16.23  3:35 am   Do you think trees are immortal

      seems like they could me

12.16.23  3:09 am   im getting started with singing do you have any tips

      not yet

12.16.23  2:49 am   What does the chair represent in all your content?

     the chair

     It's my favorite character.

12.16.23  2:41 am   How to edit video?

      just take out the bad parts

12.16.23  2:32 am   what's your favourite word in terms of how difficult it is to pronounce?

      herinneringen

12.16.23  1:59 am   hey bill. what should i name my cat? 

      that depends crucially on which cat you have

12.16.23  1:31 am   Do you think a conversation can be art?

      sure

12.16.23  1:19 am   what is the meaning of life?

      do you really think there is just 1? (i ask because you said 'the', which is usually how people treat things that there's only 1 of)
